# Download

1. `git clone https://github.com/miagebdx/pharmaApp.git`
2. `make all`
3. `cd Build`
4. `./main`

The binary file are located on the __build__ folder.


# Report

Find [here](https://http://miagebdx.github.io/pharmaApp/images/rapport.pdf)
